H0.text: Wrigley Field in Chicago USA is a venue for which sport. American Football

H1.text: Wrigley Field in Chicago USA is a venue for which sport. Rugby

H2.text: Wrigley Field in Chicago USA is a venue for which sport. Soccer

H3.text: Wrigley Field in Chicago USA is a venue for which sport. Béisbol

A4.text: Soccer returned to Wrigley Field in July 2012, when Italian club A.S. Roma defeated Poland's Zaglebie Lubin 4–0 in a friendly match with 22,181 spectators.

A5.text: The Chicago Bears of the National Football League played at Wrigley Field for 50 years, from 1921 to 1970 before relocating to Soldier Field.

A6.text: The Chicago Cubs are an American professional baseball team based in Chicago.

A7.text: The Cubs compete in Major League Baseball (MLB) as a member club of the National League (NL) Central Division.
